Traits.Name: Charge
Traits.Content:
If	the	centaur	moves	at	least	30	feet	straight	
toward	a	target	and then	hits	it	with	a	pike	attack	on	
the	same	turn,	the	target	takes	an	extra	10	(3d6)	
piercing	damage.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content:
The	centaur	makes	two	attacks:	one	with	
its	pike	and	one	with	its	hooves	or	two	with	its	
longbow.

Actions.Name: Pike
Actions.Content:
Melee	Weapon	Attack: +6	to	hit,	reach	10	ft.,	one	
target.	Hit: 9	(1d10	+	4)	piercing	damage.

Actions.Name: Hooves
Actions.Content:
Melee	Weapon	Attack: +6	to	hit,	reach	5	ft.,	
one	target.	Hit: 11	(2d6	+	4)	bludgeoning	damage.

Actions.Name: Longbow
Actions.Content:
Ranged	Weapon	Attack: +4	to	hit,	range	
150/600	ft.,	one	target.	Hit: 6	(1d8	+	2)	piercing	
damage.
